pages.text: During the use of Botania mana, you discovered that botania mana can also exist as elemental energy and be used as spell mana. This is a brand new discovery! $(br2)When the mana beam passes through a creature, it converts the creature's elements into botania elements. Monsters summoned by Gaia Guardians also carry botania elements.
